intro: Myosotis pauciflora, commonly known as the slender forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the Boraginaceae family and is characterized by its small, blue or violet flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in damp, shaded environments such as forest floors and stream banks. It has a low, spreading growth habit with hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves. Myosotis pauciflora is often found in alpine and subalpine regions, where it thrives in cool, moist conditions.
